Text.Page:
I don't care what these chicken-heads want. No goal is worth this.

I don't just want them stopped. I want them punished!

I want you to wring the neck of every mekonari you find between here and Camp Umbra. It's no worse than what they did to us!

Well, it's good you cut their fighting force down, but it sounds like Denmar's coming unwelded. Damn shame. He was a fine officer.

This place, and what Killian has the mekonaris doing? It's getting to all of us.
